definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: How did Mr. Silk get the job?
sentences.chinese: 思科先生是怎样得到这份美差的呢？

sentences.english: He got a gravy-train job in the government by pulling strings.
sentences.chinese: 他动用关系在政府部门谋得了一份美差。

sentences.english: It’s a neat form of networking and a good thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 这是互联网上一个巧妙的方法，亦是一件不错的美差。

definition: hard task/difficult mission/arduous and unrewarding undertaking/drudgery/grind/chore
to send/to assign/to appoint/servants of an official/official messenger
official post/billet/commission/CL:件[jian4]/see also 差事[chai1 shi5]
lit. seek but fail to get (idiom); fig. exactly what one’s been looking for
to do sb a favor at little cost
lit. to eat from government coffers/to serve as a government employee/to live off government money
